amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike provisions of the bill that eliminate the current national maximum speed limit.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record of September 19 as amendment No. 27, to strike provisions of the bill that would eliminate the current national maximum speed limits.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rahall amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 112 - 313 (Roll no. 676).
